name: jellyplist
description: jellyplist is a tool to convert playlists between Jellyfin and other media players or formats. It helps maintain consistent playlists across devices and applications by importing and exporting different playlist standards.
features: Playlist Conversion: Import from multiple formats, Export to standard types, Jellyfin synchronization. Universal playlist compatibility.
Format Support: M3U, PLS, XSPF formats, Metadata preservation, Path translation. Handle any playlist standard.
Sync Management: Cross-device playlists, Automatic updates, Batch operations. Keep your music organized everywhere.
